title: We all must go to Peppa Pig World, says UK PM Johnson in speech flap
content:
1. We all must go to Peppa Pig World, says UK PM Johnson in speech flap  Reuters UK
  2. Boris Johnson praises Peppa Pig in bizarre CBI speech  Guardian News
  3. CBI conference: PM accused of 'shambolic' speech to business leaders  BBC News
  4. Peppa Pig and prolonged pauses – it is, I think, time to start worrying about the prime minister  The Independent
  5. UK's Johnson tries to woo businesses, praises Peppa Pig  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: みんなでペッパピッグ・ワールドに行くべきだ」ジョンソン英首相がスピーチのフラップで語る
英国首相约翰逊在演讲中说，我们都必须去小猪佩奇世界。
英國首相約翰遜在演講中說，我們都必須去小豬佩奇世界。
